# 3D Transforms

# Transform 3D
### Dars rejasi:
- 3D
- Transform 3D

## 3D
💡**3D** - geometrik model bo'lib elementimizni fazodagi joylashuvini aniqlash uchun **3ta** nuqta kerak bo'ladi

3D shakillarda **x** va **y** oqidan tashqari **z** oqiham mavjud, va u elementimizning **3** tomonini ko'rsatish uchun kerak boladi

<img src="https://media.kidsacademy.mobi/files/Curricula%20Worksheets/Grade%201/Math/Chapter%2011-%202D%20and%203D%20Shapes/images/1g_ch11l4_l1_2d_and_3d_shapes.jpg" 
     width="300"/>
     
 ***
💡**3D** ga misol

<img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," 
     width="500"/>
     
## 3D Transforms

💡**3D Transform** - web sahifamizdagi elementlarni 3 o'lchovlik fazoda aylatirish, siljitish, o'lchovini o'zgartirish aytiladi.

❗**2D** va **3D** "transform"lar uchun bir hil **transform** hossalari ishlatiladi
<br>
<br>
<br>

## 3D Transform methods

- **rotate3d()**
- **translate3d()**
- **scale3d()**
<br>
<br>


*** 
***
***
<br>

### rotate3d()
💡**rotate3d** - elementimizni fazoda ko'rsatilgan qiymatlar bo'yicha aylantirish uchun ishlatiladi.
 
💡**rotate3d** - yana **rotateX()**, **rotateY()** va **rotateZ()** ko'rinishlariham mavjud.
 
- Ko'rinishi:
```CSS
selector-nomi {
    transform: rotate3d(x, y, z);
}
```

- Example:
```CSS
<style>
  .parent-box{
    width:300px;
    height:300px;
    border: 5px solid red;
  }
  .box{
    width:100%;
    height:100%;
    transform: rotate3d(1, 2, 1, 30deg);
  }
</style>
```
```HTML
<div class="parent-box">
  <div class="box">X, Y va Z o'qlari ishlatilgan transform box</div>
</div>
```
<br>


💡**perspective** - element foydalanvchidan qanday uzoqlikda joylashganini belgilab beradi. Qiymat qancha kichik bo'lsa, user elementga shuncha yaqin bo'ladi.

- Example:
```CSS
<style>
  .parent-box{
    width:300px;
    height:300px;
    border: 5px solid red;
  }
  .box{
    width:100%;
    height:100%;
    transform: perspective(100px) rotate3d(1, 2, 1, 30deg);
  }
</style>
```
```HTML
<div class="parent-box">
  <div class="box">perspective bilan x,y,z va deg ishlatilgan
  </div>
</div>
```
<br>
<br>

### translate3d()

💡**translate3d()** - elementimizni ko'rsatilgan qiymatlar bilan **siljitish** ( yoki surish ) uchun ishlatiladi
 
💡**translate3d()** - yana **translateX()**, **translateZ()** va **translateY()** ko'rinishlariham mavjud.
 
- Ko'rinishi:
```CSS
selector-nomi {
    transform: translate3d(x, y, z);
}

```

- Example:
```CSS
<style>
  .parent-box{
    width:300px;
    height:300px;
    border: 5px solid red;
  }
  .box{
    width:100%;
    height:100%;
    transform: translate3d(10px, 20px, 30px);
  }
</style>
```
```HTML
<div class="parent-box">
  <div class="box"></div>
</div>
```
<br>


### scale3d()

💡**scale3d()** - elementizni fazoda ko'rsatilgan qiymatlar bilan o'lchovini o'zgartirish uchun ishlatiladi
 
💡**scale3d()** - yana **scaleX()**, **scaleY()** va **scaleZ()** ko'rinishlariham mavjud.
 
- Ko'rinishi:
```CSS
selector-nomi {
    transform: scale3d(x, y, z);
}
```

- Example:
```CSS
<style>
  .parent-box{
    width:300px;
    height:300px;
    border: 5px solid red;
  }
  .box{
    width:100%;
    height:100%;
    transform: scale3d(10px, 20px, 30px);
  }
</style>
```
```HTML
<div class="parent-box">
  <div class="box"></div>
</div>
```
<br>
